name: Planetary Purpose
description:
Play as a newly created star and travel around nearby space in search of lone planets to try to invite them to your solar system by addressing their needs through labyrinth puzzles.

The game’s focus is on character interaction and puzzle-solving. After meeting and talking to planets, the player will then solve puzzles that are required to recruit the planets they desire.

Credits

  • Kai @kmcin : Programing, Art, Head writer, Level designer.
  • Avery @NumeronNetwork : Concept artist, Character Artist, Animator, Motion Designer. Back up game building
  • Xingjun : Music and Sound Design, Back up game building.  
  • Mariana @MarianaMakesArt : Head animator, Environment designer.  Asset designer
  • Olivia : UI/UX Designer, Writer, Environment designer, Back up animator.
